title: An Act relating to fair pay and safe workplaces

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Hunt of Boston, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3360) of Daniel J. Hunt for legislation to further regulate state contracts and sub-contracts.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

related_entities.name: committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 11/05/2025 from 10:30 AM-01:00 PM in A-2
Hearing rescheduled to 11/05/2025 from 10:30 AM-01:00 PM in B-2                                               and Virtual Hearing location changed
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Ways and Means

related_entities.name: the committee on House Ways and Means
committee on House Ways and Means
